about.title: ABOUT ME
about.role: I'm a Fullstack developer with a degree in Web Application Development.
about.description: I am a self-taught developer, highly motivated and passionate about web development, technology, and the internet. I love working in a team, exchanging ideas and knowledge to grow professionally. I possess versatile skills in web programming, databases, and design, acquired through my autodidactic experience. My enthusiasm for technology and innovation drives me to continue learning and improving constantly. I can easily adapt to changes and challenges in a dynamic and collaborative work environment. I am a proactive, committed, and reliable professional who values creativity and critical thinking in every project.

all-projects.title: Pla Comunitari Roquetes - Social prescription
all-projects.description: The system allows workers from CAP Roquetes (Barcelona) to register patients for activities organized by local entities, generate physical reservation tickets, and track patients to optimize their treatment and improve their quality of life. The application allows the responsible entities to manage their own activities and track attendance and patient performance.

all-projects.title: Tasklist
all-projects.description: TaskList is a simple application that allows you to add and delete tasks. The existing tasks are taken from a JSON file located within the same project. The purpose of this project is educational, aimed at teaching the basic concepts of React.

all-projects.title: CIFO Sabadell (Vallès) - Larabikes
all-projects.description: Final project of the Laravel course (210h) at CIFO Sabadell (Vallès). Website for buying and selling motorcycles between individuals. The platform includes a frontend developed in Laravel's Blade, a user authorization and authentication system, and an API for managing motorcycles. It allows users to upload, manage, and delete motorcycles, as well as make offers to other published motorcycles.
all-projects.technologies: Laravel, MySQL, Blade, and Rest API

all-projects.title: Filter movies
all-projects.description: React Filter is a learning project aimed at teaching developers how to create filters with React. The project retrieves data from the TMDB API, which displays movies. The filters are created using React's useEffect and useState hooks, allowing users to filter movies by genre. Additionally, the project uses the Framer Motion library to create animations with the filters.

all-projects.title: CIFO La Violeta - Symfofilms
all-projects.description: Final project of the Symfony course (210h) at CIFO La Violeta center. It consists of a web page that collects technical information from several movies in its file, such as director, cast, synopsis, score and other relevant details. It is a project that demonstrates the skills and knowledge acquired by the student in web development using the Symfony framework.

all-projects.title: CIFO La Violeta - Symfoplaces
all-projects.description: The project was developed during the Symfony course (210h) at CIFO La Violeta center, aimed at solidifying the course content. It involved creating a webpage where users could share their favorite places, along with accompanying photographs and other relevant details. In addition, a commenting space was enabled for other users to leave their impressions about the shared place. This project allowed students to apply the knowledge acquired during the course and improve their web development skills using Symfony.

all-projects.title: CIFO Sabadell (Vallès) - Cifopop
all-projects.description: Project developed during the Laravel course (210h) at CIFO Sabadell (Vallès) to solidify the course content. A website for buying and selling second-hand products between individuals. A user can post a product at a specific price and other users can make offers on the product. The owner of the product can accept or reject the offers.
all-projects.technologies: Laravel, MySQL, Blade y API Rest
